sentences.sContent: Students on the course learn about all aspects of business.
sentences.sCn: 这门课程的学生要学习商业活动的各个方面。

sentences.sContent: Carl began in the music business by running a recording studio.
sentences.sCn: 卡尔是从经营录音棚开始干音乐这一行的。

sentences.sContent: We do business with a number of Italian companies.
sentences.sCn: 我们和一些意大利公司做生意。

sentences.sContent: He has a wide range of business interests.

synos.tran: 商业；生意；[贸易]交易；事情

phrases.pCn: 商业模式；经营模式；业务模式
好生意；有意义的业务往来
经营策略；商业策略；企业发展战略

trans.tranCn: 商业， 生意； 职业， 事业
trans.tranOther: the activity of making money by producing or buying and selling goods, or providing services
